c1.name: Dissolution Eon: Destroyer of Worlds
c1.description: Increases Lemniscatic Wind Cycling's charges by 1.

c2.name: Annihilation Eon: Blossom of Kaleidos
c2.descriptionRaw: When in the party and not on the field, Xiao's Energy Recharge is increased by 25%.
c2.description: When in the party and not on the field, Xiao's Energy Recharge is increased by 25%.

c3.name: Conqueror of Evil: Wrath Deity
c3.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Lemniscatic Wind Cycling</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c3.description:
Increases the Level of Lemniscatic Wind Cycling by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Transcension: Extinction of Suffering
c4.descriptionRaw: When Xiao's HP falls below 50%, he gains a 100% DEF Bonus.
c4.description: When Xiao's HP falls below 50%, he gains a 100% DEF Bonus.

c5.name: Evolution Eon: Origin of Ignorance
c5.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Bane of All Evil</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c5.description:
Increases the Level of Bane of All Evil by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Conqueror of Evil: Guardian Yaksha
c6.descriptionRaw: While under the effects of <color=#FFD780FF>Bane of All Evil</color>, hitting at least 2 opponents with Xiao's Plunging Attack will immediately grant him 1 charge of <color=#FFD780FF>Lemniscatic Wind Cycling</color>, and for the next 1s, he may use Lemniscatic Wind Cycling while ignoring its CD.
c6.description: While under the effects of Bane of All Evil, hitting at least 2 opponents with Xiao's Plunging Attack will immediately grant him 1 charge of Lemniscatic Wind Cycling, and for the next 1s, he may use Lemniscatic Wind Cycling while ignoring its CD.
